_source.title: Sample Decisions Loan - Help
_source.visState:
{"title":"Sample Decisions Loan - Help","type":"markdown","params":{"fontSize":12,"markdown":"### Sample Decisions Loan dashboard

This dashboard displays data from running the Loan Validation Service decision service. The dashboard is divided into the following sections:
1. Global area
* Sample Decisions Loan - Help: This page provides a short description for each section in the dashboard.
* Sample Decisions Loan - Count of approved loans: This section shows the number of loan requests, and the total amount of the loans in dollars.
* Sample Decisions Loan - Timeline: The date histogram shows the arrival time of loan requests, and their approval statuses.
* Sample Decisions Loan - Approval status: This pie chart summarizes the data for the loan requests:
   - Loan approval: The core of the chart contrasts the number of approved and unapproved requests.
   - Data validity: This ring shows the amount of valid and invalid data.
   - Grades distribution: This ring indicates the grades of the loan requests.
   - Insurance: This ring shows the loans by insurance requirement.
2. Analysis Approval 
*  Sample Decisions Loan - Average loan amount per duration (approval): Shows the number of approved (true) and unapproved (false) loans by duration. 
*  Sample Decisions Loan - Rejected loans per amount (message): Breaks the rejected loans down by number of loans, amount and rejection message.
3. Distribution of approved loans.
*  Sample Decisions Loan - Approved loans per amount (duration): Stacks the approved loans by amount per duration.
*  Sample Decisions Loan - Average approved loan amount per monthly repayment (grade): The average approved loan amounts by monthly repayment rate and grade.
4. Sample Decisions Loan - Message: Shows the messages returned for transactions. The larger the message, the more frequent it has been given.
5. Sample Decisions Loan - Executed rules: Lists the fired rules by name, and the number of times each rule has been fired.
6. Technical search on the decisions trace.

All the widgets are set to filter on the Loan Validation Service ruleset.  All the widget names are prefixed with Sample Decisions Loan to make them easier to find.
For more information, see  the [Business Automation Insights documentation](https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SSYHZ8_18.0.x/com.ibm.dba.bai/topics/con_bai_dashboards.html).","openLinksInNewTab":false},"aggs":[]}
